title: FPIs quizzed on 'loans' for trading
description: It's unclear why the information was sought, but the Income Tax (I-T) department has directed these offshore funds to disclose the identities of the lenders, the latter's source of money, and the nature of agreement between the two parties. The move to fish out such information could well be to trace any possible and indirect links between overseas portfolio managers with Indian companies and promoters, feel some of the tax and finance professionals.
